customContent:
For 70 years, Portland Rescue Mission has provided men, women and children experiencing homelessness and addiction with:

  • Hot meals

  • Emergency shelter

  • Compassion

  • Community support

  • Addiction recovery

  • Vocational training

  • Reclaimed lives

Portland Rescue Mission touches hurting peopleâ€™s lives with hope and life-giving services and programs.

Be a part of our next 70 Years of Hope.
